title: Twelve like you
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women - Interviews
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Women in business
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Discrimination in employment
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women executives
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Employment
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Social conditions
description: Twelve women of varied circumstances describe their career development experiences and suggest how to set goals and take advantage of career opportunities. Some of their achievements include Retail Store Manager, Bank Branch Manager, Telephone Company Technician, Hospital Adminstrator, Equal Opportunity Director, Research Analyst and Deputy District Attorney. Emphasis is given to planning and the determination to succeed against all odds. Introduction and commentary by Jerry Kramer.
